'''Rufus Burrows''' was a Hobbit of [[the Shire]].

==History==
Rufus married [[Asphodel Brandybuck]], and had one child, [[Milo Burrows|Milo]]. They attended [[Bilbo's Farewell Party|Bilbo's Birthday Party]] along with Milo's children.<ref>{{App|Baggins}}</ref>

==Etymology==
[[Wikipedia:Rufus|Rufus]] is a Latin name meaning "red-haired".<ref>[[Jim Allan]], ''[[An Introduction to Elvish]]'', "Giving of Names"</ref>
